info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36460
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36460
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	ns1-04.azure-dns.com. azuredns-hostmaster.microsoft.com. 1 3600 300 2419200 300

info.name: NS Record Detection

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self' data: blob:; media-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://*.gouv.fr; script-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr 'unsafe-inline'; frame-ancestors 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2023 00:54:16 GMT Location: https://egapro.travail.gouv.fr/ Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: deny X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self' data: blob:; media-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://*.gouv.fr; script-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr 'unsafe-inline'; frame-ancestors 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2023 00:55:09 GMT Location: https://egapro.travail.gouv.fr/ Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15724800; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: deny X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://index-egapro.travail.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
